timeline.message: make unresolvable artifct problems part of depednency graph
push unresolve artifact problems deeper into dependency graph

timeline.bodyText: This method checks whether the artifact is already checked or not. Good.
timeline.author: suztomo

timeline.bodyText: Is this package-visible constructor still needed? I see tests uses new DependencyGraph(null).
timeline.author: suztomo

timeline.bodyText:
Thinking about other implementation of DependencyGraph, this levelOrder method of converting DependencyNode to DependencyGraph is specific to DependencyNode. It's because graph.addPath(path); in this method comes from the fact that current DependencyGraph consists of DependnecyPaths.
Do you think moving this method inside DependencyGraph, as DependencyGraph.from(DependencyNode root) is a good idea?
timeline.author: suztomo

replies.bodyText: Good idea. Done, and that simplified some more code too.
replies.author: elharo
